title: Exogenesis: Symphony, Pt. 3 (Redemption)
lyrics:
The final part of the three-piece work, Exogenesis Symphony, relates the thoughts and innermost feelings of the characters from the first two parts, “Overture” and “Cross Pollination.”
[Verse]
Let's start over again
Why can't we start it over again?
Just let us start it over again
And we'll be good
This time we'll get it, get it right
It's our last chance to forgive ourselves
